rank_up_message.value: KAPOW Congrats to {0} for LEVELING UP to {1} KAPOW
rank_up_message.label: Rank Up Message
rank_up_message.tooltip:
The chat message to be written each time a user ranks up.

{0} is the user name.
{1} is the rank title.

rank_down_message.value: FailFish {0} is slacking and leveled down to {1} FailFish
rank_down_message.label: Rank Down Message
rank_down_message.tooltip:
The chat message to be written each time a user ranks down.

{0} is the user name.
{1} is the rank title.

announcer_timer.label: Check Ranks Every X Seconds
announcer_timer.tooltip:
The amount of seconds between each check of user ranks. Bigger reduces computations, but results in a lag.
Minimum value is 1 second.

use_streamlabs_currency.label: Use Streamlabs Extension Currency
use_streamlabs_currency.tooltip:
[TWITCH ONLY] Check this if you are using the Streamlabs Extension Currency for the rest of the bot.
NOTE: This is a temporary fix and will negatively impact performance.
Streamers with a lot of concurrent viewers should increase the announcer timer if using this feature

rank_system.label: Which rank system is in use?
rank_system.tooltip: Set this the same as your rank system in the Currency Settings in Chatbot

announce_rank_ups.label: Enable Rank Up
announce_rank_ups.tooltip: Display the Rank Up Message in chat whenever a user ranks up

announce_rank_downs.label: Enable Rank Down
announce_rank_downs.tooltip: Display the Rank Down Message in chat whenever a user ranks down

announce_lurkers.label: Enable For Lurkers
announce_lurkers.tooltip:
Display the rank change messages for viewers who are not active in chat.

If disabled, will only send messages for users who have chatted in the last 15 minutes
